downloadDescription: The poster depicts message flow, data flow, and references that occur at runtime in BizTalk Server 2010.
detailsSection: The poster depicts the modules and components of a BizTalk Server 2010 runtime environment, including message flow, data flow, and references that occur at runtime. It can be used to show how the capabilities listed in the BizTalk Server 2010 Capabilities Poster are actually implemented. The poster is intended to be printed and measures 35”x32”.
installInstructionSection:
1. Before you click Download, you must configure the Adobe Reader to not open a PDF file in your browser. To do this:
    1. Open Adobe Reader.
    2. On the Edit menu, click Preferences.
    3. Under Categories, select Internet.
    4. Clear the Display PDF in browser option.
    5. Click OK.
    6. Close Adobe Reader.
  2. To start the download, click the Download button to start the download.

  3. Do one of the following:
    • To start the installation immediately, click Open.
    • To copy the download to your computer for installation at a later time, click Save.
    • To cancel the installation, click Cancel.
